thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 01 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ashland Global Q2 Adj EPS $1.06 From Continuing Operations

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ashland Global Q2 Adj EPS $1.06 From Continuing Operations
text:
May 1 (Reuters) - Ashland Global Holdings Inc:
* Q2 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.06 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* RAISED ADJUSTED EARNINGS GUIDANCE FOR FISCAL 2018 TO A RANGE OF $3.30 - $3.50 PER SHARE
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.04 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * QTRLY SALES GREW 21 PERCENT YEAR-OVER-YEAR TO $974 MILLION
* REITERATED OUTLOOK FOR MORE THAN $220 MILLION IN FREE CASH FLOW IN FISCAL 2018
* ANNOUNCED A PROGRAM TO ELIMINATE A TOTAL OF $120 MILLION OF EXISTING CORPORATE &SPECIALTY INGREDIENTS SG&A EXPENSES
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.87, REVENUE VIEW $956.4 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.17 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
